Name: Riding Away
About the game: Riding Away is an original song by Kathy Snax, a Boston-based musician who describes her music as 'haunted electropop'. This song is a calm melody, with sweet vocals and a music keyboard that will make you relax and take you through the visuals of the city immersed in nature. At Datawheel, we bring you original songs from new artists in unique visual experiences designed to match the mood, speed, and rhythm of every track we release. Lean into the movement. Experience the Video Clips of the 2020s with Datawheel.
Meta Title: Riding Away: May 17, 2022, Datawheel and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Riding Away? Check out the release date (May 17, 2022), developer insights from Datawheel, and a complete game summary.
